From:	Braemar Dry Cargo India <dry.in@braemar.com>
Sent:	17 October 2020 18:18
To:	Nilesh; Allianz-BIZ
Subject:	DEAR NILESH/VIKAS - ALLIANZ TBN / JSPL - CLEAN FIXTURE RECAP
Attachments:	Niton Cobalt (JSPL) VCP 29th Feb 2020 - Main CP (Working Copy).pdf

DEAR NILESH /VIKAS - PIYUSH
 
RE:ALLIANZ TBN / JSPL - CLEAN FIXTURE RECAP 
 
WITH REFERENCE TO THE SUBJECT ENQUIRY AND FURTHER TO OUR YESTERDAY DISCUSSIONS AND 
EXCHANGES PLEASE FIND BELOW CLEAN FIXTURE RECAP AGREED BETWEEN OWNERS M/S "ALLIANZ 
BULK CFR8 PTE LTD" AND CHARTERERS M/S "JINDAL STEEL & POWER LTD OR NALWA STEEL & POWER 
LTD OR BOTH (PART OR FULL QTY.) AT CHRTRS OPTION" WITH CP DATED TODAY 17TH OCTOBER , 
2020 :-
 
START RECAP 
 
///
 
VESSEL - ALLIANZ TBN 
 
STANDARD TERMS & CONDITIONS
 
1. LAYCAN : 20– 24TH Oct 2020
 
2. LOAD PORT/S: 1/2 SB 1 SP MAIN PORTS IN DHAMRA,INDIA
 
3. OWNERS TO CHECK AND FULLY COMPLY WITH LOAD PORT RESTRICTION / REGULATION.
 
4. DISCHARGE PORT (CHOPS):
A) SINGLE PORT DISCHARGE BASIS – 1/2 SB 1 SP ONE MAIN PORT, NORTH CHINA
B) SINGLE PORT DISCHARGE BASIS – 1/2 SB 1 SP ONE MAIN PORT, MID CHINA
C) SINGLE PORT DISCHARGE BASIS – 1/2 SB 1 SP ONE MAIN PORT, SOUTH CHINA
D) TWO PORT DISCHARGE INCLUDING RIVER PORT IF ANY TO BE ON OPEN BOOK BASIS.
F) VESSEL MAY DISCHARGE AT ANY FAR EAST COUNTRY PORT & SOUTH EAST ASIAN
PORT, COST FOR SAME TO BE ON OPEN BOOK BASIS.
G) FOR ALL OPEN BOOK BASIS CALCULATION, OWNERS TO PROVIDE DETAILED
BREAKDOWN OF SUCH FREIGHT DIFFERENTIAL CALCULATIONS.
OWNERS TO CHECK AND COMPLY WITH DISCHARGE PORT RESTRICTION/REGULATION AT ALL
PORTS BENDS.
 
5. CARGO : SHIPMENT 55,000.00 MT +/- 10% OWNERS OPTION IRON ORE FINES (10
MM) CARGO INTAKE TO BE ASCERTAINED BY THE FINAL DRAFT SURVEY.
 
6. LOAD RATE:
20,000 MT PWWD SHINC AT DHAMRA FOR FULL LOAD
(BASIS ALL 4 WORKING HOOKS OR SHORE CRANE/LOADER AS APPLICABLE, CHOPS)
 
7. DISCHARGE RATE: 15,000 MT PWWD OF 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS
SHINC ANY MAIN PORT, NORTH/MID/SOUTH CHINA.
(BASIS ALL 4 WORKING HOOKS OR SHORE CRANE/LOADER AS APPLICABLE, CHOPS)
 
8. VESSEL TYPE: SDBC SELF TRIMMING GEARED VESSEL BASIS MINIMUM 4X30 MT SWL
CRANES & MINIMUM 4X12 CBM GRABS, CLASSED 100 A1 BY LLOYDS OR EQUIVALENT
CLASSIFICATION SOCIETY & LESS THAN 15 YEAR OLD VESSEL DELETE "ONLY AND MAINTAIN 
MIN 3 STAR RIGHTSHIP RATING" - to be read as "Owners to endeavour to provide a vsl having Right 
Ship rating of three or more stars". . DELETE - "MAX LOA TO BE 190 MTRS" INSERT - but 
Owner is responsible for all port restrictions for vessel calling at all ports as per shipment. VESSEL 
TO COMPLY WITH
PERFORMANCE NORMS AT ALL PORTS OF CALL BENDS. IN CASE OF ANY PENALTY DUE TO 
VESSEL
NOT COMPLYING WITH PERFORMANCE NORMS & PORT RESTRICTIONS BENDS, SAME WILL BE 
ON
OWNER’S ACCOUNT. OWNERS TO ENSURE THAT CRANES AND GRABS SHOULD BE OF 
SUFFICIENT
CAPACITY (VOLUMETRIC AND TONNE) TO PROVIDE MENTIONED LOAD/DISCHARGE RATES.
SAILING DRAFT AT LOAD PORT SHOULD NOT BE MORE THAN 13 MTRS
 
9. CHARTER PARTY: ALL T & C OF THE FIXTURE SHALL BE GOVERNED AS PER LAST DONE CP - "MV 
NITON COBALT/ JSPL CP DTD 29TH FEB, 2020" (WORKING COPY ATTACHED) WITH LOGICAL 
AMENDMENTS AS PER AGREED MAIN TERMS.
 
10. ETA LOAD/ DISCHARGE PORT: MIN. 2 WORKING DAYS NOTICE AT LOAD PORT & 10 
DAYS
7 DAYS / 5 DAYS / 4 DAYS / 3 DAYS / 48 HRS / 24 HRS NOTICE AT DISCHARGE 
PORT(S).
 
11. NOR LOAD/DISPORT: TO BE TENDERED ATDN SHINC/ SHINC
 
12. ONLY MASTER DIRECT NOR AND ETA NOTCIES WILL BE VALID AND CONSIDERED, 
AGENTS
FORWARDED MSG NOT ACCEPTABLE. MASTER TO SEND DIRECT ETA & NOR TO EMAIL ID
devendra.negi@jindalsteel.com & umesh.bhatia@panthertransfreight.com AT 
BENDS.
 
13. LAYTIME: NON REVERSIBLE BENDS
 
14. TURN TIME: 12 HOURS AT ALL PORTS OF CALL IN THE VOYAGE, EIU TIME SHALL 
NOT COUNT.
 
15. OWNERS TO CHECK AND ENSURE COMPLETE SEA-WORTHINESS OF THE VESSEL, AND THE
VESSEL’S WORKABILITY AND ACCEPTANCE AT LOAD / DISCHARGE PORTS. OWNERS TO 
CHECK
AND SATISFY THEMSELVES REGARDING ANY PORT RESTRICTIONS INCLUDING DRAFT
RESTRICTION AT ALL PORTS AND SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE SUITABILITY OF THE 
VESSEL
IN REGARD TO LOADING/DISCHARGING OF INTENDED CARGO AND QUANTITY AT THE
NOMINATED PORTS. CHARTERER SHALL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CONSEQUENCES 
WHICH
MAY ARISE DUE TO PREVAILING RESTRICTIONS/ OPERATIONS AT ANY PORT AFTER 
ARRIVAL OF
VESSEL. OWNERS TO CHECK AND SATISFY VESSEL’S SUITABILITY TO LOAD/ DISCHARGE
INTENDED CARGO AND MIN/MAX QTY AT ALLOTTED BERTH WITH AVAILABLE DRAFT.
OWNERS TO CONFIRM VESSEL TO BE CLASSED LLOYDS 100A1 OR EQUIVALENT CLASS
WHICH HAS BEEN INSURABLE BY A REPUTABLE INTERNATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANY
AND COVERED UNDER P & I CLUB
 
16.ALL SUBJECTS DUELY LIFTED WITHIN TIME. IN CASE OF TBN,
PERFORMING VESSEL TO BE NOMINATED BY THE OWNER TO THE VOYAGE CHARTERER WITHIN
24 WORKING HRS. AFTER FIXING MAIN TERMS.
IN CASE OF TBN, PERFROMING VESSEL TO BE ACCEPTED BY CHARTRS WITHIN 24 WROKING
HRS. AFTER VESSEL NOMINATION ALONG WITH ALL VALID CERTS (CERTIFICATE LIST
ATTACHED).
 
OTHER TERMS:
1 A/C JINDAL STEEL & POWER LTD OR NALWA STEEL & POWER LTD OR BOTH (PART OR
FULL QTY.) AT CHRTRS OPTION
2.COMPLETE C/P CHAIN DETAILS, MAXIMUM 2 ALLOWED:
VESSEL HEAD OWNER :
ADDRESS :
NAME OF THE PIC:
EMAIL ID:
PHONE NOS.:
 
DISPONENT OWNER : ALLIANZ BULK CFR8 PTE. LTD.
Address : 3 SHENTON WAY # 10-05
ADDRESS : SHENTON HOUSE, SINGAPORE 068805
 
NAME OF THE PIC: MR NILESH SHIRODKAR
EMAIL ID: biz@abcfr8.com
PHONE NOS.: +917304943009
P&I CLUB OF PERFORMING OWNER:- CHARTERERS PNI CLUB
 
COMPLETE BANK ACCOUNT DETAILS OF THE FREIGHT BENEFICIARY (DISPONENT OWNERS OR HEAD 
OWNER).
 
ACCOUNT NAME: ALLIANZ BULK CFR8 PTE LTD
ACCOUNT NO : 0101006535
BANK NAME: STANDARD CHARTERED BANK (SINGAPORE) LTD
ADDRESS: SINGAPORE - BATTERY ROAD
SWIFT CODE: SCBLSG22XXX
BANK CODE: 9496
 
3. 100% FREIGHT WILL BE PAID BEFORE BREAKING BULK AT DISCHARGE PORT AND ANY
DEMURRAGE/ DESPATCH WILL BE PAID WITHIN 60 DAYS FROM THE COMPLETION OF 
DISCHARGE
OF CARGO AT DISCHARGE PORT.
 
4. CHARTERER'S NOMINATED AGENTS AT BOTH LOAD-PORTS AND DISCHARGE PORTS BUT
PAYMENT TO BE DONE BY OWNERS.
 
5. TURN TIME OF 12 HOURS AT ALL PORTS OF CALL BENDS, EIU TIME SHALL NOT 
COUNT.
VESSEL BEING QUARANTINED AT BENDS RENDER THE NOR VOID & INVALID. NOR TO BE
RE- TENDERED ONCE AGAIN ON COMPLETION OF QUARANTINE PERIOD AND APPROVAL
BY CONCERNED NODAL AUTHORITY AT PORT FOR CARGO OPERATION IN REGARDS TO
COVID 19. ANY ADDITIONAL COST INCULDUING BERTH HIRE, ADDITONAL SHIFTING
COSTING, ADDITIONAL PORT EXPENSES IF VESSEL IS QUARANTINED DUE TO COVID 19
BENDS WILL BE ON OWNERS ACCOUNT
 
6. LAYTIME TO COUNT ON NON REVERSIBLE BASIS. ALL PORT HOLIDAYS WILL BE 
EXCLUDED
FROM LAY-TIME CALCULATIONS.
 
7. BELOW INSTANCE AT LOAD/ DISCHARGE PORT/S NOT TO COUNT IN LAYTIME OR
TIME ON DEMURRAGE EVEN IF VESSEL IS ON DEMURRAGE
A. SUSPENSION OF WORK BY PORT AUTHORITY NOT TO COUNT IN LAYTIME.
B. ANY TIME LOST DUE TO THE PORT AUTHORITY PREVENTING, IMPEDING OR 
PROHIBITING
LOADING ONLY DUE TO VESSELS DEFICIENCIES.
C. ANY TIME LOST DUE TO COMPLIANCE WITH STATUTORY AND /OR CLASS REQUIREMENTS 
FOR
THE VESSEL.
D. TIME LOST AFTER NOR TENDERING DUE TO BAD/SEVERE WEATHER, RAIN, FOG
DRIZZLING, SOON AFTER VESSEL TENDERS NOR AT BENDS.
E. GANGWAY DOWN, INTIAL, INTERMEDIATE & FINAL DRAUGHT SURVEY, HATCH 
INESPECTION
TIME AND TIME USED FOR VESSEL RELATED CUSTOMS CLEARANCE FORMALITIES/PORT
REQUIREMENT.
F. SHIFTING FROM ANCHORAGE TO BERTH AND IN BETWEEN THE BERTHS FROM ANCHOR 
AWAY
OR PILOT ON BOARD WHICHEVER IS EARLIER.
G. ANY TIME LOST DUE TO A LABOUR DISPUTE, STRIKE, GO SLOW, WORK TO RULE, LOCK 
OUT,
STOPPAGE OR RESTRAINT OF LABOUR INVOLVING THE MASTER, OFFICERS OR CREW OF THE
VESSEL OR TUG BOATS OR PILOTS.
H. FORCE MAJEURE EVENT.
I. WAITING TIME FOR TIDES
J. LAYTIME TO CEASE ON COMPLETION OF LOADING & DISCHARGING AT LOAD / 
DISCHARGE
PORT.
K. TIME NOT TO COUNT IF VESSEL IS QUARANTINED FOR 14 DAYS PERIOD DUE TO
COVID 19 OR AS LONG IT IS QUARANTINED AS PER THE RESPECTIVE NODAL
AUTHORITY DEALING THE MATTER / VESSEL CREW(S) IN THE
PORTS(LOAD/DISCHARGE) EVEN IF THE VESSEL ON DEMURRAGE.
L. OWNER TO ENSURE THAT THEIR APPOINTED P&I SURVEYOR EXECUTE THE CARGO SURVEY
SOON AFTER CARGO READINESS DECALRED BY CHRTRS, ON SAME DAY OR MAX BY 
SUBSEQUENT
DAY AFTER CARGO READINESS DECLARATION AND ENDEAVOUR THEIR BEST TO PROVIDE THE
SURVEY RESULT AS SOON AS POSSIBLE BUT IN CASE WITHIN ONE DAY AFTER SAMPLE 
DRAWN
OR ELSE ALL TIME AND COST WILL BE ON OWNERS ACCOUNT, EVEN IF VESSEL IS ON
DEMURRAGE. (ONLY APPICABLE FOR IRON ORE FINES CARGO)
M. ONCE OWNERS APPOINTED P & I SURVEYOR CONFIRM THE INTENDED CARGO IS 
SUITABLE
FOR LOADING BUT EVEN AFTER THAT MASTER/CHIEF OFFICER DISRUPT THE LOADING THEN 
ALL
COST AND TIME ON OWNERS ACCOUNT, EVEN IF VESSEL IS ON DEMURRAGE. (ONLY
APPICABLE FOR IRON ORE FINES CARGO)
O. TIME NOT TO COUNT (EVEN IF VESSEL ON DEMURRAGE) FOR COVID 19 NUCLEIC
ACID TEST OF THE CREW(INCLUDING WAITING PERIOD) FOR CARRYING OUT THE
NUCLEIC TEST AS PER THE NEW REGULATION AT CHINESE PORT IN REGARDS TO CREW
CHANGE, LAST BUNKER SUPPLY AND DUE TO WHASTSOVER AMENDMENT TO THE
REGULATION.
 
8. ANY OVER AGE INSURANCE PREMIUM ON CARGO DUE TO VESSEL’S AGE OR ANY AWRP ON
VESSEL (IF ANY) WILL BE ON OWNER’S ACCOUNT.
 
9. PLACE OF ARBITRATION IS SINGAPORE IN ACCORDANCE WITH SIAC.
 
10. IF CHARTERERS AND SHIPPER AGREE TO LOAD CARGO IN EXCESS OF THE 
CONTRACTUAL
QUANTITY AS AGREED, FREIGHT RATE APPLICABLE FOR THE ADDITIONAL CARGO QUANTITY 
WILL
BE AT 50% THE FREIGHT RATE AGREED & NO DEAD FREIGHT APPLICABLE ON SUCH 
ADITIONAL
CARGO.
 
11. OWNERS TO NOMINATE A VESSEL AT LEAST 3 DAYS PRIOR ETA OF VESSEL, HOWEVER, 
THEY
CAN SUBSTITUTE VESSEL (WITH SAME ETA AS OF PREVIOUS VESSEL) PRIOR MIN. 3 DAYS 
OF
ARRIVAL OF VESSEL.
 
12. ETA OF SUBSTITUTE VESSEL SHOULD HAVE SAME OR LATER DATE BUT WITHIN THE 
LAYCAN
AS THAT OF PREVIOUSLY NOMINATED VESSEL
 
13. VESSEL OWNERS IN CP CHAIN AND VESSEL FLAG SHOULD NOT BE IN O.F.A.C. SDN 
LIST/ UN/
USA SANCTIONS OR SANCTIONED BY ANY OTHER GOVERNING BODY. THE PERFORMING OWNER
TO WARRANT THAT THIS CLAUSE SHALL APPLY BACK TO BACK TO ALL OWNERS IN THE 
CHARTER
PARTY CHAIN FOR THIS VOYAGE. ALL CONSEQUENTIAL, INCLUDING COSTS, DUE TO NON –
COMPLIANCE SHALL BE ON PERFROMING OWNERS ACCOUNT.
 
14. ACTUAL DISCHARGE PORT WILL BE DECLARED UPON VESSEL CROSSING SINGAPORE.
 
15. IF VESSEL IS OUT OF LAY CAN, CHARTERERS HAVE AN OPTION TO CANCEL THE 
FIXTURE AND
BOOK ANOTHER VESSEL FROM THE MARKET OR TO CONTINUE WITH THE SAME VESSEL OR 
THE
VESSEL SUBSTITUTED BY SAME OWNER THEN THE LAYTIME WILL COUNT FROM 
COMMENCEMENT
OF LOADING.
 
16. PERFORMING VESSEL LAST PORT OF CALL SHOULD NOT BE EITHER CHITTAGONG OR
MONGLA. - DELETE 
 
17. SUCCESSFUL BIDDER/ FREIGHT BENEFICIARY, IF ALREADY NOT REGISTERED WITH 
JSPL,
WILL HAVE TO GET REGISTERED AS VENDOR WITH JSPL ON CLEAN FIXTURE.
18. CHARTERERS WILL REQUIRE FOLLOWING DOCUMENTS FOR FREIGHT REMITTANCE 
PURPOSE
& PERFORMING OWNERS GUARANTEE TO PROVIDE UNDER MENTIONED VALID DOCUMENTS /
DECLARATIONS & STRICTLY COMPLY BELOW MENTIONED CONDITIONS WHICH ARE MANDATORY
FOR THE VESSEL FIXTURE:-
i) VALID TAX RESIDENCY CERTIFICATE (TRC) OF PERFORMING OWNERS
ii) VALID CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION / PERMANENT ESTABLISHMENT OF 
PERFORMING
OWNERS
iii) DULY FILLED FORM NO. 10F.
iv) NON PE CERTIFICATE
v) Failing to provide valid Tax Residency Certificate & Incorporation Cert. 
with whom INDIA
Doesn’t have DTA Agreement then TDS will be applicable as per Indian law & 
such TDS shall be
deducted from the amount due to owners ( ocean freight & demurrage 
beneficiary ).
vi) Charterer is not working with company registered in Hong Kong / Marshall 
Island / British
Virgin Island or any country where there is No Valid TRC (Tax Residency 
Certificate) which clearly
states that Owners are Tax Payee in that country.
vi) Signed CP by performing Owner.
 
19. NIL ADCOM ONLY 1.25PCT TO BRAEMAR ACM INDIA 
 
20. OWNERS / DISPONENT OWNERS GUARANTEE THAT, THE VESSEL WILL BE DELIVERED 
FREE
FROM ANY OBLIGATION, ENCUMBRANCE, CLAIM OR LIEN OF WHATSOEVER NATURE THAT 
WOULD
INTERFERE IN ANY WAY WITH THE VESSEL’S PERFORMANCE OF THIS VOYAGE AND / OR 
THE
CARRIAGE AND DELIVERY OF THE CARGO WITH THE UTMOST DISPATCH, AND SHALL REMAIN
THROUGHOUT THE CURRENCY OF THE CHARTER. IN THE EVENT THE VESSEL / CARGO IS 
UNDER
LIEN OR ARRESTED OR OTHERWISE DETAINED DURING THE CURRENCY OF THIS CHARTER 
PARTY
( OR AFTER COMPLETION OF DISCHARGE IN RESPECT OF THE CARGO ) THE OWNER’S /
DISPONENT OWNER’S SHALL TAKE IMMEDIATE ACTION TO PROCURE THE RELEASE OF THE
VESSEL / CARGO FROM ANY SUCH LIEN OR ARREST OR DETENTION AND TO REMAIN FULLY
RESPONSIBLE FOR THE COST OR DAMAGES CAUSED AS A RESULT OF ANY LIEN OR ARREST 
OR
INTERRUPTION OF THE VESSEL’S PERFORMANCE UNDER THIS CHARTER PARTY.
 
21. DISPONENT OWNERS & VESSEL OWNER WARRANT AND GUARANTEE AT THE TIME OF
THE NOMINATION OF THE PERFORMING VESSEL , AS FOLLOWS:
(I) THAT THE VESSEL, ITS OWNERS AND OPERATORS ARE NOT SANCTIONED
UNDER THE UNITED NATIONS (UN), U.S., UNITED KINGDOM, EUROPEAN UNION,
SWISS, AUSTRALIAN, CANADIAN OR JAPANESE ECONOMIC SANCTIONS LAWS
RELATING TO TRANSACTIONS WITH RESTRICTED COUNTRIES, PERSONS AND
ENTITIES (THE "SANCTIONS LAWS") AND ARE NOT LISTED ON ANY UN SANCTIONED
PARTY LIST, THE U.S. OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL’S (“OFAC”) SDN LIST,
THE U.S. BUREAU OF INDUSTRY AND SECURITY’S (“BIS”) LISTS, OR THE UNITED
KINGDOM, EUROPEAN UNION, SWISS, AUSTRALIAN, CANADIAN OR JAPANESE
SANCTIONED PARTY LISTS;
(II) THAT THE VESSEL IS NOT REGISTERED BY, AND THE VESSEL, ITS OWNERS
AND OPERATORS ARE NOT IN ANY WAY, DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY OWNED,
CONTROLLED BY, OR RELATED TO ANY CUBAN, IRANIAN, IRAQI, SUDANESE, NORTH
KOREAN, SYRIAN OR LIBYAN INTERESTS, OR TO ANY COUNTRY, PERSON OR ENTITY
THAT MAY CAUSE JINDAL STEEL & POWER LIMITED OR A PERSON SUBJECT TO U.S.
JURISDICTION TO BE IN VIOLATION OF OR PENALIZED BY THE SANCTIONS LAWS,
WHETHER OR NOT A PERSON SUBJECT TO U.S. JURISDICTION IS IN FACT INVOLVED
IN THIS CHARTER OR THE TRADE;
(III) THAT THE VESSEL HAS NOT CALLED AT A PORT IN IRAN, SYRIA, NORTH
KOREA, ZIMBABWE OR CUBA IN THE PAST 180 DAYS AND DOES NOT HAVE ON BOARD
ANY [CARGO OR] BUNKERS WHICH WERE LOADED OR ORIGINATE IN IRAN, SYRIA,
NORTH KOREA OR CUBA OR ARE BOUND FOR A PORT IN ANY OF THOSE COUNTRIES;
(IV) THAT THE VESSEL DOES NOT HAVE ANY CUBAN, IRANIAN, SYRIAN, NORTH
KOREA OR SUDANESE NATIONALS ON BOARD, WHETHER AS OFFICERS, CREW OR
FOR ANY OTHER REASON.
IN THE EVENT OF A BREACH OF ANY OF THE ABOVE WARRANTIES AND GUARANTEES,
DISPONENT OWNERS & VESSEL OWNERS SHALL INDEMNIFY THE CHARTERER (JINDAL
STEEL & POWER LIMITED ) THE SELLER & THE BUYER IN FULL FOR ANY LOSS OR 
DAMAGE,
EXPENSES OF WHATSOEVER INCURRED BY CHARTERER . VOYAGE CHARTERER SHALL ALSO
BE ENTITLED TO TERMINATE THIS CONTRACT, SUCH TERMINATION BEING WITHOUT
PREJUDICE TO THEIR RIGHT TO CLAIM DAMAGES FROM THE DISPONENT OWNERS &
VESSEL OWNER.
IN THE EVENT THAT DISPONENT OWNERS & VESSEL OWNERS ARE UNABLE TO PROVIDE
OR PROCURE ACCEPTABLE SECURITY IN RESPECT OF VOYAGE CHARTERER’S CLAIM
ARISING OUT OF DISPONENT OWNER'S & VESSEL OWNERS BREACH OF THIS CLAUSE,
DISPONENT OWNERS & VESSEL OWNERS UNDERTAKE TO TAKE STEPS TO DISCHARGE THE
CARGO PROMPTLY AND/OR INDEMNIFY VOYAGE CHARTERER’S IN FULL FOR THE COSTS OF
DOING SO.
 
22. NOC FROM THE CHAIN OF OWNERS / DISPONENT OWNER REGARDING PERFORMANCE OF
THE VOYAGE .
 
23. THE FIXTURE TO BE INDEPENDENT OF ANY OTHER FIXTURES AND NO PREVIOUS 
CLAIMS /
DISPUTES / ISSUES BETWEEN HEAD OWNERS / OPERATORS / DISPONENT OWNERS /
CHARTERERS TO BE LINKED / ASSOCIATED WITH THIS FIXTURE.
 
24. OWNERS/MASTERS HAVE TO SHARE DISCHARGE PORT “DRAFT SURVEY RECORD” 
CERTIFIED
BY THE MASTER’S AND THE SURVEYOR AT DISCHARGE PORT.
 
25. ICE CLAUSE AT DISCHARGE PORT (IF TO BE CALLED) AS PER BUYERS WORDINGS
 
26. OWNERS TO PROVIDE SIGN & STAMP FIXTURE NOTE COPY AND PROVISIONAL FREIGHT
INVOICE BASIS INTENDED QTY. TO LOAD ALONG WITH VESSEL NOMINATION.
& WHILE NOMINATING VESSEL OWENERS TO PROVIDE NAME OF DISPONENT & HEAD OWNERS
OF THE VESSEL.
 
27. NO BUNKER ESCALATION CLAUSE TO APPLY OWING TO CHANGE IN TYPE OF BUNKER
DUE TO IMO 2020 REGULATION COMPLIANCE. COMPLIANCE TO IMO 2020 REGULATIONS
– MARPOL ANNEXURE VI(AS AMENDED OR REVISED FROM TIME TO TIME ) DURING THIS
CHARTER, OWNERS TO INDEMINFY CHARTERERS FOR THE CONSEQUENCES OF ANY
FAILURES OF OWNERS TO COMPLY WITH THE APPLICABLE RULES, REGULATIONS AND
LAWS, AND ALL REQUIREMENTS OF ANY EMISSION CONTROL ZONE. COSTS INCURRED,
TIME TAKEN OR DELAYS SUFFERED WHATSOVER DUE TO NON-COMPLIANCE SHALL BE
ON OWNERS ACCOUNT, EVEN IF VESSEL ON DEMURRAGE.
 
28. CHARTERERS TO ISSUE LOI BSS DISCHARGE OF CARGO. OWNERS TO ENSURE OBL IS
TO BE RELEASED WITHIN 2 DAYS OF COMPELTION OF LOADING. IF REQUIRED OBL TO
BE ISSUEED FROM OUTSIDE INDIA AS PER CHARTERERS REQUIREMENT. IF REQUIRED ,
CHARTERERS TO SWITCH OBL
 
29. OTHERS AS PER MV NITON COBALT/JSPL CP DATED 29TH FEB 2020 WITH LOGICAL 
AMENDMENTS AS PER MAIN TERMS RECAP.
 
OWNERS TO PROVIDE BELOW DETAILS:
1. VESSEL PARTICULARS WITH DETAILS OF HATCH DIMENSION & GRAB / GEARS - TBA 
2. FIRM ETA PARADIP & ITINERARY - TBA 
3. VOYAGE TIME - TBA 
4. PERFORMING OPERATOR/OWNER FULL STYLE IN CLUDING PIC - AS ADVISED EARLIER 
5. MOST COMPETITIVE FREIGHT RATE PMT ON FIOST BASIS NORTH CHINA (SINGLE PORT
DISCHARGE BASIS) EX. DHAMRA, INDIA - USD 9.75 PMT BASIS 1/1 
FREIGHT IS INCLUSIVE OF ALL RISK, PREMIUM, INSURANCE COVER, EXTRA WAR RISK, 
KIDNAP &
RANSOM AND LOSS OF HIRE, INCLUDING ALL PORT CHARGES, PILOTAGES, LIGHT DUES, 
BERTH
HIRE, PRIORITY BERTH HIRE & ALL OTHER DUES OF WHATSOEVER NATURE USUALLY PAID 
BY
THE VESSEL.
DIFFERENTIAL FREIGHT FOR OTHER PORTS REMAIN FIXED AS PER BELOW-
A) FREIGHT FOR MID CHINA PORT (SINGLE PORT DISCHARGE BASIS) = USD 0.50 PMT 
LESS
OVER FREIGHT FOR NORTH CHINA (SINGLE PORT DISCHARGE BASIS)
B) FREIGHT FOR SOUTH CHINA PORT (SINGLE PORT DISCHARGE BASIS) = USD 1.50 PMT 
LESS
OVER FREIGHT FOR NORTH CHINA (SINGLE PORT DISCHARGE BASIS)
C) FREIGHT FOR TWO PORTS LOADING OR/AND DISCHARGE INCLUDING RIVER PORTS NOT
INCLUDED ABOVE WILL BE ON OPEN BOOK BASIS.
FOR OPEN BOOK CALCULATIONS, TC HIRE RATE WILL BE APPLICABLE AS AGREED
DEMURRAGE RATE MINUS BUNKER CONSUMPTION IN PORT 4.0 MTONS / DAY (24
